channel.title: Wasteland items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wasteland items"

item.title: Wasteland items
item.content:encoded: I recently found out that Wasteland 'type' permanent items don't stack. Having makeshift pistol, pistol of repeating and wasteland pistol don't stack. Of course this was written in the BvS FAQ. I think there should be a Note in every item which belongs to that list (Pistols, Scythes, Cloaks,â€¦). I edited the Pistol of repeating page: pistol-of-repeating. Please leave me a message whether I can continue to do this, to stop/delete it or to place another message like this.
